ygData.subject: Re: and yet...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Sheldon Jolson  To:  Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 10:51 AM Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] and yet...
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Sheldon Jolson <Sheldon_Jolson@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 10:51 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] and yet...


> From: "Sheldon Jolson" <Sheldon_Jolson@...>
>
>
>
> Who has killed Phin since he has been buffed? But still,
> PCs win simply because of numbers and tactics. Unfortunately,
> numbers will not always win because of hardware constraints
> and tactics are systematically being made illegal by Verant.
> Basically this game will come down to pushing a button or 2
> every few seconds without the need for thinking.
>

Exactly, this was my point. Thanks for making it clear. EQ is
gradually going downhill, the economy is getting saturated, Verant is making
intelligence and ingenuity less and less possible. Not my kind of game
anymore.

--
Darkblade, Big Brother of Megalomaniacs Anonymous
